metadata.name: Suspicious ScreenSave Change by Reg.exe
metadata.comment: Adversaries may establish persistence by executing malicious content triggered by user inactivity. Screensavers are programs that execute after a configurable time of user inactivity and consist of Portable Executable (PE) files with a .scr file extension

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\reg.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_current_user\\\\control panel\\\\desktop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkcu\\\\control panel\\\\desktop'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v screensaveactive')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t reg_sz')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d 1')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v screensavetimeout')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t reg_sz')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v screensaverissecure')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t reg_sz')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d 0')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v scrnsave.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t reg_sz')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.scr')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f'))))

output.summary: Adversaries may establish persistence by executing malicious content triggered by user inactivity. Screensavers are programs that execute after a configurable time of user inactivity and consist of Portable Executable (PE) files with a .scr file extension
